communityGuidelines.title: Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.subtitle: Fostering a professional, respectful, and collaborative environment for all.
communityGuidelines.intro: Welcome to the DamDoh community! To ensure our platform remains a productive and safe space for all stakeholders, we ask that you adhere to the following guidelines:

respectful.title: Be Respectful and Professional
respectful.description: Engage in courteous and constructive discussions. Personal attacks, harassment, hate speech, or defamatory comments will not be tolerated.

authentic.title: Be Authentic and Honest
authentic.description: Represent yourself and your business truthfully. Do not misrepresent products, services, or certifications. All transactions and interactions should be conducted with integrity.

relevant.title: Stay On-Topic and Relevant
relevant.description: Keep discussions and listings relevant to agriculture, the supply chain, and the purpose of each platform feature. Spam, irrelevant advertising, or solicitation is not permitted.

fairTrade.title: Uphold Fair Trade Practices
fairTrade.description: We encourage fair pricing and transparent negotiations. Do not engage in price-fixing, fraudulent activities, or attempts to exploit other members.

sustainable.title: Promote Sustainability
sustainable.description: While not mandatory for all interactions, we strongly encourage the promotion and discussion of sustainable and regenerative agricultural practices.

reporting.title: Reporting Violations
reporting.content: If you see content or behavior that violates these guidelines, please report it to our support team at {emailLink}.

communityGuidelines.conclusion: By using DamDoh, you agree to these guidelines. Violations may result in content removal, account suspension, or permanent banning. Let's work together to build a thriving and trustworthy community.

careers.title: Careers at DamDoh
careers.subtitle: Join our mission to revolutionize agriculture. We're looking for passionate individuals to help us build a more sustainable future.

whyWorkWithUs.title: Why Work With Us?
whyWorkWithUs.intro: At DamDoh, you'll be part of a diverse, global team dedicated to making a real-world impact. We offer:
whyWorkWithUs.point1: A mission-driven culture focused on empowerment and sustainability.
whyWorkWithUs.point2: Opportunities to work with cutting-edge technology like AI and blockchain.
whyWorkWithUs.point3: A collaborative environment where your ideas can shape the future of food.
whyWorkWithUs.point4: Competitive compensation and flexible work arrangements.
whyWorkWithUs.point5: The chance to see your work directly improve the lives of farmers worldwide.

job1.title: Senior Backend Engineer (Node.js, Firestore)
job1.description: Design and build the scalable microservices that power our platform. Strong experience with Node.js, TypeScript, and NoSQL databases is required.

job2.title: Lead Agronomist & Farmer Relations
job2.description: Lead our field agent team, provide expert agronomic advice, and build strong relationships with our farmer communities.

job3.title: UX/UI Designer for Emerging Markets
job3.description: Design intuitive and accessible user interfaces for our mobile and web platforms, with a focus on users in low-connectivity environments.
